如果0=(x-1)^2 exact solution x=1
但係用newton method
G(Xk)=Xk-(Xk-1)^2)/(2(Xk-1))
算converge rate at x=1 就要take derivative of G(Xk) then plug in x=1. 但係the denominator of the derivative of G(Xk) 係有(x-1)^2 term.咁係唔係應該no solution
